1.value: Great work on this nested comment system! The recursive structure is really clean. I've been working on something similar and this gives me some good ideas for improving my approach.

2.value: Thanks! I spent quite a bit of time figuring out the data structure. The key was using a flat object with parent-child relationships rather than deeply nested arrays.

3.value: That's exactly the approach I would recommend! Flat structures are so much easier to work with for operations like deletion and updates.
